articles.headline: Ravens sign veteran nose tackle John Jenkins
articles.description: The Ravens on Friday signed journeyman nose tackle John Jenkins, who most recently played two seasons for the Raiders.

articles.headline: The numbers that led to Brock Purdy's new contract with the 49ers
articles.description: Check out some of Brock Purdy's stats that led to his new five-year deal with the 49ers.

images.name: The numbers that led to Brock Purdy's new contract with the 49ers
images.caption: Check out some of Brock Purdy's stats that led to his new five-year deal with the 49ers.

articles.headline: Brock Purdy's new contract comes with expectation to win
articles.description: San Francisco has long benefited from the league's best bargain contract. Now, it's on Purdy to deliver results.

images.name: Brock Purdy [608x342] - Copy
images.caption: Brock Purdy signed a five-year, $265M contract extension, which ties him to the 49ers until after the 2030 season.

images.name: Reaction: Brock Purdy [608x342]
images.caption: Brock Purdy signed a five-year, $265M contract extension, which ties him to the 49ers until after the 2030 season.

images.name: 49ers play 'Choose Your Own Adventure' to reveal 2025 schedule
images.caption: The 49ers reveal their schedule in the form of a video game where you have to pick your next adventure to reveal each week.

articles.headline: Sources: Brock Purdy, 49ers agree to 5-year, $265M deal
articles.description: Brock Purdy, the last pick in the 2022 NFL draft who has gone on to become a Pro Bowler, is finalizing a 5-year, $265M deal with the 49ers, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.headline: Snake at PGA Championship reminiscent of other moments of wildlife on the field
articles.description: A snake slithered through the course at Quail Hollow Golf Club on Friday, but it's far from the first time a creature stole the show at a sporting event.

images.name: Snake joins the field at PGA Championship
images.caption: During the second round of the PGA Championship, a snake makes its way onto the course.

articles.headline: Clark interested in how Glenn puts his imprint on Jets
articles.description: Ryan Clark is intrigued to see if Aaron Glenn and Justin Fields can make their marks with the Jets.

images.name: Clark interested in how Glenn puts his imprint on Jets
images.caption: Ryan Clark is intrigued to see if Aaron Glenn and Justin Fields can make their marks with the Jets.

articles.headline: Former Jets DB Jamal Adams likes idea of return to team
articles.description: Former Jets safety Jamal Adams is interested in a return to the team.

images.name: Jamal Adams [600x400]
images.caption: In 2023, Adams played nine games totaling seven tackles for loss, two QB hits and zero sacks -- his third straight season without bringing down an opposing quarterback.

images.name: Clark interested in how Glenn puts his imprint on Jets
images.caption: Ryan Clark is intrigued to see if Aaron Glenn and Justin Fields can make their marks with the Jets.

articles.headline: Bears' search for stadium site shifts to Arlington Heights
articles.description: The Bears' plans for a new domed stadium have shifted again, now focusing on a 326-acre property owned by the team in the Arlington Heights suburb.

images.name: Foxworth: Caleb Williams is in a must-deliver spot with Bears
images.caption: Domonique Foxworth explains that Caleb Williams has to play well now that his attempts to avoid the Bears have been revealed.

articles.headline: Missouri special session to be held for Chiefs, Royals plans
articles.description: Missouri's governor said Friday that he will call the Legislature into a special session to consider incentives aimed at keeping the Kansas City Chiefs and Royals from moving to Kansas.

images.name: Chiefs play round of 'Cash Cab' for 2025 schedule release
images.caption: "Cash Cab" host Ben Bailey helps the Kansas City Chiefs reveal their schedule for the 2025 NFL season.

articles.headline: Mina Kimes hopes Caleb Williams gets better support from Bears

articles.headline: Paige Bueckers' WNBA regular-season debut follows similar hype as others
articles.description: Paige Bueckers will make her WNBA regular-season debut for the Wings on Friday against the Lynx. Here's a look at other hyped first games, from Caitlin Clark to LeBron James.

images.name: sabrina ionescu wnba debut [608x342]
images.caption: Sabrina Ionescu struggled from the field in her WNBA debut.
images.credit: (Photo by Stephen Gosling/NBAE via Getty Images)

images.name: zion nba debut [608x342]
images.caption: Zion Williamson scored 17 consecutive fourth-quarter points in his NBA debut.

images.name: trevor lawrence debut [608x342]
images.caption: Trevor Lawrence had three interceptions and three touchdowns in his NFL debut.

images.name: ichiro debut [608x342]
images.caption: Seattle Mariners right fielder Ichiro Suzuki during his MLB debut in 2001.

images.name: connor mcdavid [608x342]
images.caption: Connor McDavid skates during his NHL debut against the St. Louis Blues in 2015.
images.credit: (Photo by Scott Rovak/NHLI via Getty Images)

images.name: Before They Were Next: Paige Bueckers
images.caption: Relive Paige Bueckers' rise from her early days in Minnesota to becoming a national champion at UConn.

articles.headline: Falcons won't get cute with roles for Walker, Pearce
articles.description: The Falcons don't plan on getting cute with how they use their new pass rushers.

images.name: Jalon Walker, left and James Pearce Jr. [1296x729]
images.caption: The Falcons were surprised Jalon Walker fell all the way to No. 15, so they altered their plans to take James Pearce in that slot. Atlanta GM Terry Fontenot then traded back into the first round to land both pass rushers.

images.name: Dan Orlovsky talks QB battles around the league, NFL schedule release & more
images.caption: ESPN Analyst Dan Orlovsky joins The Pat McAfee show to discuss quarterback situations around the NFL, Jaxson Dart in his first year with the New York Giants and the NFL schedule release so far.

articles.headline: Rookie NFL running back role tiers: Stacking 25 draft picks
articles.description: Which rookie RBs will make noise in 2025? We grouped 25 draft picks by expected Year 1 role, from Ashton Jeanty to Jacory Croskey-Merritt.

images.name: The highlights that make Ashton Jeanty a top NFL draft prospect
images.caption: Check out highlights from Boise State RB Ashton Jeanty as he becomes the newest Las Vegas Raider.

articles.headline: Why Derek Carr's surprise retirement has prompted questions
articles.description: Derek Carr surprisingly announced his retirement on May 10. The decision -- and the timing -- has insiders throughout the league talking.

images.name: Derek Carr 0501625 lead [608x342]
images.caption: Derek Carr threw 40 touchdown passes and 13 interceptions in two seasons with the Saints.

images.name: Kellen Moore [576x324]
images.caption: The challenge got steeper for first-year Saints coach Kellen Moore following Carr's retirement.

images.name: Derek Carr injury [576x324]
images.caption: Derek Carr suffered an injury to his non-throwing hand late in a Dec. 8 win over the New York Giants.

images.name: Mickey and Co. [576x324] - Copy
images.caption: Carr (with then-Saints coach Dennis Allen, owner Gayle Benson and GM Mickey Loomis) went 14-13 in two seasons as New Orleans' starter.

images.name: How did Derek Carr come to the decision to retire?
images.caption: Jeremy Fowler joins "SportsCenter" to discuss quarterback Derek Carr's retirement.

articles.headline: Steelers reestablishing identity with 2025 rookie class
articles.description: The Steelers' 2025 draft class shows coach Mike Tomlin wants to focus on his defensive roots.

images.name: Steelers mini camp [608x342]
images.caption: Running back Caleb Johnson was one of the Steelers' seven draft picks.

images.name: Stephen A.: You cannot expect Steelers to win games with current QBs
images.caption: Stephen A. Smith and Ryan Clark discuss the Steelers' prospects this season with the team's current QBs as Pittsburgh waits on a decision from Aaron Rodgers.

articles.headline: Why Justin Fields is perfect fit for the Jets' new direction
articles.description: Following Aaron Rodgers is never easy, but New York's newest quarterback has a quiet demeanor that suits his new team.

articles.headline: Bengals allege conflict of interest by stadium consultant
articles.description: The Bengals on Thursday raised questions about a key player in the team's stadium discussion with Hamilton County and his connection to the Browns.

images.name: We still rolling? Bengals leave camera rolling for schedule release
images.caption: The Cincinnati Bengals leave their camera rolling well after the release of their 2025 schedule.

articles.headline: 49ers near deal to sell 6.2% stake in franchise to 3 Bay Area families
articles.description: The San Francisco 49ers are working to complete the sale of a 6.2% ownership stake in the team to three Bay Area families, a source told ESPN on Thursday.

images.caption: The 49ers reveal their schedule in the form of a video game where you have to pick your next adventure to reveal each week.
